title: PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2018
notes: Runs in windowed mode by default. Settings.exe needs .NET 4.5 framework or later to run. Didn't try to install .NET in the proton wine prefix. But if you use another wineprefix or a VM with PES 2018. You can run Settings.exe to enable full screen. Then copy settings.dat to ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/592580/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/KONAMI/PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2018.

title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2018
notes: Instead of playing on high texture (like on windows), I can just play on low. It's not possible to set keys via settings.exe, I had to take the setting file from my Windows installation and override it.
Had to take my settings from windows installation as settings.exe is not include in the proton simulation. After it was playable but only on low instead of high texture (like on win7). No crashes!!!
title: PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2018
